sentences.en: " Yes -- and you meow back, if you get a chance.
sentences.cn: “ 好.如果我叫了, 你也回应一声.
“害怕! 那还不至于. 你来学猫叫好 吗 ?”

sentences.en: His new coat is the cat's meow.
sentences.cn: 他的新外衣简直棒极啦.

sentences.en: I couldn't meow that night, becuz auntie was watching me, but I'll meow this time.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上我姨妈一直在盯住我, 我怎么能学猫叫呢.但是这一回我会咪呜的.

sentences.en: I heard a high - pitched loud meow, meow, meow.
sentences.cn: 我听到喵喵喵的高声尖叫声.

sentences.en: Look at the cat. Meow! Meow! Meow!
sentences.cn: 看那只猫. 喵! 喵! 喵!

sentences.en: Meow made a new tooth from a kernel of corn!
sentences.cn: 猫咪新咬了一排牙印在玉米粒上!

sentences.en: Meow, meow, meow, meow, they began to cry.
sentences.cn: 喵, 喵, 喵, 喵, 它们开始哭了起来.

sentences.en: Meow, meow, meow, meow, we shall have some pie.
sentences.cn: “喵, 喵, 喵, 喵, 我们都有馅饼吃了. ”

sentences.en: Meow, meow, meow. Meow, Meow, meow.
sentences.cn: 喵, 喵, 喵. 喵, 喵, 喵.

sentences.en: So he can meow all day because I don't care.
sentences.cn: 可能因我的不关心它会叫一天.

sentences.en: Student: inside Prof.: if all cats meow then cats should be inside the class of things that meow.
sentences.cn: 学生：内部,教授：如果所有猫都会叫，那么应该是包括猫,在猫叫的种群中。

sentences.en: That guy thinks he's the cat's meow.
sentences.cn: 那个家伙认为自己最了不起啦.

sentences.en: When the subjects saw each image, they also heard a matching noise—for instance, on seeing a cat, they heard a meow.
sentences.cn: 当受试者观看每张图片时他们将同时听到一个相匹配的声音，例如当看一个猫时，他们会听到一声猫叫。

sentences.en: With meow meow here and meow meow there, E - I - E - I - O.
sentences.cn: 这儿喵喵喵,那儿喵喵喵, 依呀依呀奥.
